prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Abhijit Dass Email -abhijitdass93@gmail.com
Lead I Software Engineer Mobile- +91-9438454445
• A Microsoft Professional with 7+ years of total experience in Software Development.
• Working with US Technology International Private Limited as Lead II Software Engineer.
• Driven by new challenges & desires to be successful in all Endeavours. Immensely enjoys navigating
each aspect of complex projects.
• Application and Web development using ASP.Net MVC and core MVC, core web API, Entity framework
for data extraction.
• Extensive experience in Database design, developing T-SQL queries, stored procedures, triggers in SQL
Server.
• A team player with strong communication, analytic and relationship management skills.
Objective:
To work in a competitive environment that effectively utilizes my analytic, interpersonal and
organizational skills to conceive and achieve solutions. The solutions which help the organization in not only
meeting its targets, but also allowing it to grow, thereby, enhancing my own skills as an individual and as a key
player in the organization's development.
Academic Details:
B.Tech in 2015 from Biju Patnaik University of technology (Odisha).
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
Languages & Databases: C#, SQL Server 2017
Technical Expertise: .Net, Asp.Net Core MVC, Asp .Net Core web API, WPF, Windows Form,
MS SQL Server, Angular17, Unit Test and BDD, CICD pipeline, Entity
Framework core, LINQ
Scripting Language: JavaScript, jQuery
Version Control Tools: Team Foundation Server (TFS), GIT
IDE’s & Tools: MS Visual Studio 2022, SSRS, Splunk, Dynatrace.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:
Company: US Technology International Private Limited. Dec 2020 – Till Date
Profile: Senior Software Engineer
Technology: .Net, C#, .Net Core Web API, Micro Services, Git, BDD, Unit test XUnit, Dynatrace, CICD
pipeline, Angular17, JIRA.
Work Location: Dell Technologies, Bangalore, Karnataka.
Projects Details:
Working as a senior developer to enhance the commerce platform of Dell, the main proj
